analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xf6f6afe1907ffe9467b04947c7e3af9ad14e2333.sol:
	Contract MintableToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xf6f6afe1907ffe9467b04947c7e3af9ad14e2333.sol#180)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
